contentrichtext.text: '''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding the proposed deletion of the page entitled [[Signed, Sealed, and Delivered: Highlights of the Miller Record]].''' '''This page is kept as an historic record.''' '''The result of the debate was to keep the article.''' ---- Bizarre, rambling POV about Georgia's [[Zell Miller]]. - [[User:Lucky 6.9|Lucky 6.9]] 17:54, 17 May 2004 (UTC) * Smells like a copyvio too. Delete POV ramble. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 18:24, May 17, 2004 (UTC) *Delete [[User:John Kenney|john]] 06:18, 18 May 2004 (UTC) * POV rant. Merge the useful content into [[Zell Miller]] and delete. [[User:Andris|Andris]] 06:20, May 18, 2004 (UTC) ---- This page is now preserved as an archive of the debate and is no longer 'live'. Subsequent comments on the issue should be placed on other relevant 'live' pages. '''Please do not edit this page.''' ----
